minioAlreadyAvailable.description: Flag to enable the deployment of minio. false to deploy minio, true otherwise.

minioImage.description: Describe the container image for minio. **Note**: must be filled only when minioAlreadyAvailable = false

dockerRegistryRequired.description: flag to create the secret for a private docker registry. true to create the secret, false otherwise

sparkTaskContainerImage.description: Describe the container image for a spark task

repo.description: container image repo for spark task

tag.description: container image tag for spark task

s3Endpoint.description: Endpoint of the S3 (or compatible) service where data is stored. **Note**: must be filled only when minioAlreadyAvailable = true.

dockerConfigJsonEncoded.description: base64-encoded secret for docker registry credentials. See https://kubernetes.io/docs/tasks/configure-pod-container/pull-image-private-registry/#registry-secret-existing-credentials. **Node**: must be filled only when dockerRegistryRequired = true

doInstallAirflowInHook.description: Enable the installation of Airflow in a Helm hook

doInstallSparkOperatorInHook.description: Enable the installation of Spark Operator in a Helm hook

doInstallPrometheusInHook.description: Enable the installation of Prometheus and the corresponding operator in a Helm hook
